comments.body:
Clarified subject to help search results.

Thanks for your contribution.

why are no people voted for this
this will make combat more fun
I'd like to see people bowspam with this enchantment on everyone's shields!
I think the same amount of power as they hit the shield seems a little too powerful.
That'd be strong, but if it's a rare enough enchantement, it could work. Besides, a shield isn't often aimed like a bow, so unless you're bouncing a fireball, chances are you won't hit your target.
As of 1.16, you can use F3+F4 to quickly switch between game modes!
Yeah, I totally agree to this one and also will make it less boring and more challenging.
like it but don't make it  happen in easy.
I like it this would be nice feature to Minecraft Making it more realistic
Yo
"an island where it rains lightning!?"
But it’s just too easy...

I think this will be an amazing idea. Although I agree it would make the game “too easy” there is a whole side of the Minecraft community that would would like or need this. It can be a toggled option. I like to play in peaceful, I like to build and adventure, I like a laidback game... but because of that I’m not allowed to fight skeletons that come in my home. I don’t get to play the way I’d like. Make this an option for those of us who want it.
I want it in the game it would make it soooo much better

i would call this "Passive Mode"
which could be enabled/disabled on any difficulty level
minecraft creators surely missed the beat on this one :)
perhaps it's by design to make sure players don't have the best experience possible xD

so, there are several custom modifications available to make this happen!
look for:
- Passive Mobs [mod] (curseforge)
- Apathetic Mobs Reborn [mod] (curseforge)
- Neutral Hostiles [datapack] (curseforge)

<3

I agree, it's like you're being in Creative Mode and they just ignore you, even after attacking them. I did not thought about the Zombies should ignore Villagers, though, great idea.

I'd like to call it "Peaceful Plus" or "Peaceful+"... whatever fits better; if someone else has a better name, go for it. :)
It would be cool if some flowers are always random, not based on the world seed.

Keep in mind that the Lily of the Valley was selected as the Poison Suspicious Stew specifically because it is poisonous irl.

However, from a gameplay perspective, this is a much better way to approach Suspicious Stew. People will only craft the "good" stews now that the recipes are up on the wiki. There's no mystery to it anymore. Voted!
love the idea, cape worthy!
And, most importantly, regeneration gives undead mobs poison.

This is a good idea, however, if it affects every mob, it would cancel out the usefulness of the affects. Creepers would still be the same speed relative to you, Illagers would have their health regenerate when you attack them, etc. Therefore, it should only affect passive mobs and undead mobs
Did you get your idea from the YouTuber Grain?
Yes, I thought it was such a great idea for an achievement!
Oh
I think the idea sounds great.
No respiration.  Dolphins cannot breathe underwater, and thus the reason for them leaping.
I meant aspirational as that it makes you breath longer, not forever.
Ok, maybe.  Similar to the turtle shell helmet.
Brilliant idea to teach climate change
I really think this needs to be added it would be a game changer

so a speed run world setting? 

it is an interesting idea but I do not think rushing through everything and likely missing a lot of the fun stuff should be encouraged.

(hardcore mode does something similar but it does not encourage rushing it encourages safety)
Time should be 2 hours
this is a great idea. Railcraft has this. PS whole rail system needs updates.

I use rail systems to do all of my mining and traveling underground.   Laying track is a labor intensive and slow process.  Automating the process would be a huge improvement to the game

thanks for listening
So how do you protect yourself in the beginning? Parents? Auto-built shelter?
Auto build shelter
This is one of the dumbest ideas I've ever seen.  That's not what Minecraft is about!
stupid idea

I like this idea but I don’t think you should start out as a baby. When you spawn your a young adult. Then you start to get older you become slower then die where you’ll respawn in your world but it’s aged like stone becomes cracked villages are bigger or abandoned. If aging is added I feel like there should be something that makes you younger like a potion of youth

First of all, I'd like to note that making potions placeable in cauldrons is something I discussed in my Liquid Reforms post. It also is a current feature in Bedrock Edition.

But concerning your other ideas: I'm not sure you've thought this through enough. Let's say I have a leather helmet with instant damage II potion effect. What on earth does that do? Do I get instant-damaged every time I walk around or something?

As another example: does having a leather chest plate with a regeneration potion effect mean I get 24/7 regeneration? That's seriously overpowered. With Mending, I could easily counteract the extra durability cost you mentioned.

This is a pretty creative idea, but it wouldn't work. No support, sadly.
Genius
I need me some running shoes
I'd say instead of durability, it just runs out as you wear it, like how there's a time limit when you drink a potion

It would be great for mapmakers to be able to create armor with any number of potion effects, similar to the turtle shell. It should also be possible to give requirements to the effect, just like how the turtle shell stops giving water breathing while you're underwater.
Please guys vote and support
We need off hand in MCPE to come close java
Please we need to support this more and more so we can create equality.
yeah instead of wasting their time on this useless feature Mojang should at least start planning for the end update

the locator bar sucks, example: a player, let's name him Mark, it's playing minecraft 1.22 bedrock with friends Jhonny and Steve.

Steve uses the player locator bar to track Mark, go to his house and grief

 

THIS IS WHAT WILL HAPPEN WITH PLAYER BAR.

i think that Player Location feature is very invasive and unbalanced. it gives griefers and unsavory users a way to stalk targets. it shouldn't be left up to server owners to disable. should be per user client or based on friends whitelist

It would be interesting if it was linked to an item and both players would be holding the same one, similar to maps. 

Maybe players with a compass, as long as those have the same name.
This feature is honestly such a great addition for smps, no need for additional mods, you can just find your friends easily with the bar. Idk what you are yapping about, it is so configurable too.
Lol you forgot the best one Xbox 360 edition

Might you have noticed that you included Playstation 4 when this is already available(Only returning players that previously owned the legacy version). But I would still include it since not everyone has this special button.
why no  ps3 and xbox 360

Hello again, just wanted to give a big thank you to the moderators of this page, you truly are the backbone of the Minecraft "idea factory" and I could not appreciate you more. Thank you for all your hard work, I really appreciate it. Keep up the good work!
EXACTLY!!
YES! Please allow this!! My minecraft world also got corrupted but i was able to import it into Preview…

And also Allays fight particular mobs, i.e vexes, phantoms and blazes when carrying a sword(that's overpowering the mob tho)

And probably they should smile when music is played on the Jukebox

I'd think Amethyst Armor would be possible, but it's sketchy since Amethyst are common despite being in a small cave area, and its existence may also break the balance

Also we'll only wait their confirmation when 1.19 comes
You should just be able to dye the allay

Thank you Stealth for including my ideas in your video!

Here are some more ideas for my favorite mob in minecraft.

  • The Allay will only be found in a new beautiful structure in the birch forest, known as the mystic pass.
  • It would be summoned and pop out from a nearby tree in this place with a small pond (with a waterfall) the Allay could also occassionally jump into the water with a splash animation, just to give it more character.
  • The player would also get the "An Allay a Day" Advancement. The reason some of the progression is as it is with 1) not getting multiple every day, 2) needing only simple amethyst boots and noteblocks, is that the allay should be usable early to mid game as well as expanded in late game (specific music disc finds increasing speed).
  • The Allay could also not automatically connect to a note block, but maybe by playing a noteblock, the nearest unlinked allay will pair to it.
  • Another late game progression idea is cloaks, made from "ancient cloth" from the deep dark (or archeology when it is added). These customizable stylish outfits would not only stop ranged attacks (arrows) by having them pass right through the allay, but the player could wear these as well, blocking some of their hitbox when dealing with arrows. The feet are still in trouble tho.
  • Created by Crash Gaming

I have a idea for the allay: the player who tames the allay is the only player that can give the allay something and take away something from the allay. This will be useful because if you have a brother or sister that likes to mess with your stuff they can't change what the allay has so they can't mess up your idea with the allay and you can have your own personal mob that only you can mess with.
I think you can get diamonds to you but I’m not sure
Time for stew and diamonds for you is driving me crazy to get without multiplayer. This should be earned with JUST one player

Or, you should be able to give a villager diamonds and suspicious stew. Any villager should be able to pick up diamonds you throw at them, but I think a Nitwit would be best to give a suspicious stew to, since you can't trade with them anyway. That would probably be easiest for coding since there would only be one action added to one type of NPC.
Yeah, getting Diamonds To You and Time For Stew can be just as daunting as Master Trader if you prefer single player.
Can't you already blow the horn to make the pillager horn noise? It just doesn't have any functionality yet.
Good idea except it could a bit more like real life and instead it could find their way to you instead of teleporting.
Please Added Right Mouse Support In Android 🙏

The identity potion should require an ingredient that has been exposed to the player you seek to mimic that way it can tell how the user should look and a likewise requirement should exist for any other shapeshifting potions.

 I also think that it should come with these features:                                                                                    If you heat water in a cauldron it should produce wisps of steam and if you heat it for too long in a confined space it should fill said space with a fog that dissipates after the source of steam runs out and that if you heat a water filled cauldron long enough it should run dry. It could be like having a ritual that creates fog and you could even replace the water with a potion mixture that when thrown in a bottle produces a similar effect that creates a more cohesive cloud that lasts for a short time regardless of location and when released from a cauldron that is heated long enough can grow to effect a larger area.

On a more minor note I think in addition to producing suspicious brews one should be able to make normal soups and when using enough safe general cooking ingredients even a hearty stew that can vary in quality with cooking time and ingredients.
Good ideas.
